attributes.action: Get rid of (abolish) the european human rights act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the security and safey of this country the goverment must withdraw from the european human rights act,to give the police and security services a chance to do there JOB properly for the safety of the british people and the many visitors that come here every year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
